from sys import stdin
from collections import Counter

n = int(stdin.readline())
a = list(map(int, stdin.readline().split()))

c = Counter(a)

print(n - max(c.values()))

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()

if len(a) < 2:
    print(1)
    exit()

a_set = set()

for i in range(len(a) - 1):
    if a[i] == a[i + 1]:
        a_set.add(a[i])

print(n - len(a_set))

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()

ans = 1
prev = a[0]
for i in range(1, n):
    if a[i] > prev + 1:
        ans += 1
        prev = a[i]

print(ans)
